work_experience.job_title: Senior HR Manager, HR Business Partner
work_experience.responsibilities: Aligned HR strategies with business objectives while overseeing employee relations, talent review, and succession planning across U.S. and Canadian operations. Developed and implemented HR policies, training programs, onboarding, and benefits administration. Partnered with leadership to identify training needs and execute executive coaching initiatives. Facilitated relocation and visa management for expatriates and ensured compliance with global HR standards.

Managed payroll and benefits transitions from PEO to full-service systems across 15 states and 5 localities. Handled vendor RFPs, compliance processes, and benefits renewals. Developed and implemented policies, employee handbooks, safety training, and orientation programs. Coordinated benefits open enrollment and served as primary contact for HR queries and compliance.

Oversaw payroll setup, compliance, and HR operations across multiple U.S. and Canadian sites. Streamlined HR processes and implemented talent management and employee development programs. Achieved benefits cost reduction of 15% in the U.S. and 22% in Canada. Delivered manager training via in-person and virtual sessions. Partnered with directors for performance management and workforce planning.

Supervised building operations, tenant relations, OSHA safety compliance, and emergency procedures. Managed engineering safety training, coordinated building renovations and green initiatives, and supported LEED certification processes. Oversaw recruitment and performance reviews for service coordinators.

projects.name: PEO Transition and Benefits Cost Reduction
projects.description: Led transition from PEO to full-service payroll and benefits setup across multiple states, achieving 15% U.S. and 22% Canadian annual cost reductions.

projects.name: Global HR Integration Project
projects.description: Developed integrated HR solutions aligning business objectives across U.S. and Canadian operations, including HRIS implementation and compliance frameworks.

projects.name: Manager Development Program
projects.description: Created and delivered monthly 'Lunch and Learn' sessions and executive coaching programs to strengthen management capabilities.

projects.name: Expatriate Visa and Relocation Management
projects.description: Managed visa documentation, relocation cost control, and onboarding for global expats transferring to U.S. and Canadian sites.

awards.name: Individual Award for Global Excellence
awards.description: Recognized for outstanding performance and contribution to global HR excellence initiatives.
